namespaceSelector.description: Selects Namespaces using cluster scoped-labels.  This matches all pods in all namespaces selected by this label selector. This field follows standard label selector semantics. If present but empty, this selector selects all namespaces.

ipBlock.description: IPBlock defines policy on a particular IPBlock

podSelector.description: This is a label selector which selects Pods in this namespace. This field follows standard label selector semantics. If present but empty, this selector selects all pods in this namespace.
